    • evaluateAttribute

      public abstract double evaluateAttribute​(int attribute) throws java.lang.Exception
      evaluates an individual attribute
      Parameters:
      attribute - the index of the attribute to be evaluated
      Returns:
      the "merit" of the attribute
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the attribute could not be evaluated

    • evaluateAttribute

      public abstract double evaluateAttribute​(int[] attributes, int[] classAttributes) throws java.lang.Exception
      Evaluates a set of attributes
      Parameters:
      attributes - an int[] value
      classAttributes - an int[] value
      Returns:
      a double value
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs
